skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The strange elements found in the Warpstone Desert have only deepened Zhao Ming's fascination with and understanding of alchemy.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 1% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 2% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: 4% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
True understanding gives rise to a spirit of protection.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.localised_description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: I can procure anything an agent might need for any mission.
My lord, we can save time and supplies if we make some slight modifications to this design.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -1% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: For use only in the most dire of circumstances.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +3% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Ammunition: +6% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Ammunition: +10% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: You will fetch ammunition, clean and repair weapons, and do anything else our marksmen require of you

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Reload time reduction: +6% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Reload time reduction: +10% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: No one is allowed in or out without my express permission. This is for their safety, of course.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Violence is always the answer, even when it's not.
There's nothing wrong with being aware of one's capabilities - particularly when one is capable of so much.
Deception is frowned upon, but only if you're found out.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In a battle of wills, one must not falter.
Even Slaanesh would be unable to break this one's self control.
No being can kill what it cannot catch.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If knowledge is power, then this one is powerful indeed.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The trick is to think two steps aheadâ€¦ and then think one step ahead of that."
This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -5% for Jade Warriors, Jade Warriors (Halberds) and Jade Warrior Crossbowmen units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Hardy and resilient, this being stands firm in the face of all challenges.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for melee units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: No arms have yet been forged that this warrior has been unable to master.
When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A place for everything and everything in its place. Live by this motto and Chaos will stand out like the proverbial sore thumb.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when fighting against Daemons of Chaos
	(all units in army)
Ward save: 10% when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Daemons of Chaos

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.
An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.
